alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 8:25PM EST until February 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY THAT WAS IN EFFECT THIS EVENING IS NOW CANCELLED... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and wintry mix precipitation including sleet and freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer and Hamilton Counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates Wednesday night may reach 1 inch per hour.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
